lyrics.label: Verse 1
lines: Joy to the world the Lord is come
Let every heart prepare Him room
And heaven and heaven and nature sing

lyrics.label: Verse 2
lines: Joy to the earth the Savior reigns

lyrics.label: Verse 3
lines: No more let sins and sorrows grow
He comes to make His blessings flow
Far as the curse is found
Far as the curse is found
Far as far as the curse is found

lyrics.label: Verse 4
lines: He rules the world with truth and grace
And wonders wonders of His love

lyrics.label: Verse 1
lines: O come ye O come ye to Bethlehem

lyrics.label: Chorus
lines: O come let us adore Him
O come let us adore Him
O come let us adore Him

lyrics.label: Verse 3
lines: Jesus to Thee be all glory giv'n

lyrics.label: Verse 1
lines: It's Summer time and I am in

lyrics.label: Chorus
lines: Oh! Jingle bells, jingle bells, jingle all the way
Christmas in Australia on a scorching summer's day, hey!
Jingle bells, jingle bells, Christmastime is beaut!
Oh, what fun it is to ride in a rusty Holden Ute

lyrics.label: Verse 3
lines: Then pack the car and all shoot through, before the washing up

lyrics.label: Chorus 2
lines: Oh! Jingle bells, jingle bells, jingle all the way
Christmas in Australia on a scorching summer's day, hey!
Jingle bells, jingle bells, Christmastime is beaut!
Oh, what fun it is to ride in a rusty Holden Ute
Oh, what fun it is to ride in a rusty Holden Ute

lyrics.label: Verse 1
lines: How still we see you lie
Above your deep and dreamless sleep
Yet in your dark streets shines bright
The hopes and fears of all the years

lyrics.label: Verse 2
lines: For Christ is born of Mary
While mortals sleep the angels keep
And praises sing to God the King
And peace to men on earth

lyrics.label: Verse 3
lines: So God imparts to human hearts
No ear may hear His coming
But in this world of sin
Where meek souls will receive Him still

lyrics.label: Verse 4
lines: Cast out our sin and enter in
O come to us abide with us

lyrics.label: Verse 1
lines: All is calm all is bright
Holy infant so tender and mild

lyrics.label: Verse 3
lines: Son of God love's pure light
Radiant beams from Thy holy face
With the dawn of redeeming grace

lyrics.label: Verse 4
lines: With the angels let us sing

lyrics.label: Verse 1
lines: Peace on earth and mercy mild
Join the triumph of the skies

lyrics.label: Verse 2
lines: Late in time behold Him come
Veiled in flesh the Godhead see
Pleased as man with men to dwell

lyrics.label: Verse 3
lines: Hail the heav'n-born Prince of Peace
Light and life to all He brings
Ris'n with healing in His wings
Mild He lays His glory by
Born that man no more may die
Born to raise the sons of earth
Born to give them second birth

lyrics.label: Verse 1
lines: The first Noel the angel did say
Was to certain poor shepherds in fields as they lay
In fields where they lay keeping their sheep
On a cold winter's night that was so deep

lyrics.label: Chorus
lines: Born is the King of Israel

lyrics.label: Verse 2
lines: Then wise men from a country far
Looked up and saw a guiding star
They traveled on by night and day
To reach the place where Jesus lay

lyrics.label: Verse 3
lines: On bended knee they worshipped him
They offered there in his presence
Their gold and myrrh and frankincense

lyrics.label: Verse 4
lines: And let us all with one accord
Sing praises to our heavenly lord
For Christ has our salvation wrought
And with his blood our life has bought

lyrics.label: Chorus x2
lines: Born is the King of Israel

lyrics.label: Verse 1
lines: O holy night the stars are brightly shining
It is the night of the dear Savior's birth
Long lay the world in sin and error pining
Till He appeared and the soul felt its worth
A thrill of hope the weary world rejoices
For yonder breaks a new and glorious morn

lyrics.label: Chorus 1
lines: O night when Christ was born

lyrics.label: Verse 2
lines: Led by the light of faith serenely beaming
With glowing hearts by His cradle we stand
So led by light of a star sweetly gleaming
Here came the wise men from Orient land
The King of kings lay thus in lowly manger
In all our trials born to be our Friend

lyrics.label: Chorus 2
lines: To our weakness is no stranger

lyrics.label: Verse 3
lines: Truly He taught us to love one another
His law is love and His gospel is peace
Chains shall He break for the slave is our brother
And in His name all oppression shall cease
Sweet hymns of joy in grateful chorus raise we
Let all within us praise His holy name

title: We Three Kings Of Orient Are

lyrics.label: Verse 1
lines: We three kings of Orient are
Field and fountain moor and mountain

lyrics.label: Chorus
lines: O star of wonder star of night
Guide us to Your perfect light

lyrics.label: Verse 2
lines: Born a King on Bethlehem's plain
Gold I bring to crown Him again

lyrics.label: Verse 4
lines: Myrrh is mine its bitter perfume
Breathes a life of gathering gloom
Sealed in the stone cold tomb

lyrics.label: Verse 5
lines: Sounds through the earth and skies

title: Angels From The Realms Of Glory

lyrics.label: Verse 1
lines: Angels from the realms of glory
Wing your flight o'er all the earth

lyrics.label: Verse 2
lines: Watching o'er your flocks by night
God with us is now residing

lyrics.label: Verse 3
lines: Watching long in hope and fear

lyrics.label: Verse 4
lines: Though an infant now we view Him
He shall fill His Father's throne
Gather all the nations to Him
Every knee shall then bow down

title: We Wish You A Merry Christmas

lyrics.label: Verse
lines: We wish you a merry Christmas
We wish you a merry Christmas
We wish you a merry Christmas and a happy new year

lyrics.label: Chorus
lines: Good tidings we bring to you and your kin
We wish you a merry Christmas and a happy new year

lyrics.label: End
lines: We wish you a merry Christmas and a happy new year
